settings.ahg_description: Enter to win a collection of pieces with the summer heat in mind from our favourite independent and small businesses. Total value of the winning prize, roughly $5000 AUD.
settings.ahg_instructions: 1. Follow all participating brands on Instagram: @fellaswim — @poppylissiman @terry_towelling — @elle__musa — @ciao_lucia — @mariafarrofootwear — @mineraleir @_theavalon_ — @romu.alda — @fourthstreethome 2. Tag 3 friends in the comment section of the Instagram post, here. 3. To complete your entry - submit your details below:
settings.ahg_tandcs: Entries close December 14 at 5:00 PM AEST. The winner will be announced on December 14 at 6:00 PM AEDT and will be chosen at random + notified via email and Instagram. All entrants must follow all three entry steps outlined above to be eligible and in the running for this giveaway. Open to all International entrants. Currency shown will be converted to equivalent currency of winner. By entering this giveaway, you are agreeing to subscribe your email to the mail list of all participating brands; Fella Swim, Poppy Lissiman, Terry Towelling, Elle Musa, Ciao Lucia, Maria Farro Footwear, Mineraleir, The Avalon, Romu Alda & Fourth Street Home. You may withdraw your consent at any time by clicking the unsubscribe link at the bottom of the emails you receive. All brands will cover shipping costs individually of their prizes.
